#x ranges are kept, whereas z ranges are ignored (i.e, in this example, and x between 170000 and 190000 is kept, but a z equal to 0 will be removed) 
x 171000 189000 171000 190000 171000 190000 163500 182000 163500 182000
x 280000 299000 280000 299000 281000 299000 273000 292000 274000 292000
x 390000 408500 390000 408500 391000 409000 383000 402000 383000 402000
x 500000 518500 500000 518500 501000 519000 493000 510000 493000 511000
x 610000 628000 610000 628000 610000 628000 603000 621000 603000 621000
z 0 0
#z 4000 inf
